Articles.Content:
Hello

 

I love SSPX. Its so beautiful. I absolutely love it. However, my computers hardware is not the top of the shelf. Its 8GB ram, i5-6500, and a GTX 960. Its enough to play with only SSPX, and not have any problems. When i try to play with more mods, KSP starts crashing. I know that SSPX is a high intensity mod, and am wondering whether deleting files of parts I don't need(I'm going to make cinematic, therefore, I can select out what pieces i need, then delete the ones i don't.), would save the precious ram needed. 

 

If you help, i am forever indebted. 

Thanks
